name: The Life Of Night City
desc: Help Cops with Quota. Take a hit mission for corpo ladies. Experience a more mixed crowd. The City is Lively!
author: RedRockStudio (Eli, Drew, Donk)

changelog.desc:
(Hotfix date 11-9-2022)
 -Shortened the time frame for gang spawns from 8pm-Midnight.
 -Fixed Radiant Bounty not triggering.

 -If you Pressed the option for Everyone to hate V,
 All spawns, by crowd, will be scanner highlighted.
